name: Experiment sheet design
description:
Every major company should conduct experiments to test new ideas.


Generating ideas is easy, and falling in love with them is even easier! But are you sure if your ideas are right?


Thanks to the experiment sheet design, You and your team can able to manage experimentation within the project in a more organised way. Thanks to the ESD and your research team You can able to test a number of your ideas with end-users.


You can able to make strategic decisions more easily with this tool!


Use my “Experiment sheet design” and "Learning sheet" for experiments in your work! Working with this tool really streamlines work for all team members!
